segments.text: There's a lot happening in this kitchen all at once.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is doing a simple chore, drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, the faucet is gushing, and water is pooling on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is right in that growing puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't even flinch or look down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Behind her, the children are causing their own brand of trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is practically defying gravity on that unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Heâ€™s reaching for cookies from a jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is an accomplice, waiting eagerly below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me so frustrated that the adult is completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone is going to slip, or that stool will tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This entire situation feels like it's on the verge of collapsing.
segments.speaker: PAR
